architectural_notes: Inspection timer state must be reset to 15s on solve completion, independent of prior pause/stop state.
known_issues: Inspection timer does not reset after a solve if the user stops inspection mid-countdown; it should reset to 15s after each solve.

existing_features.title: Reset the inspection countdown back to 15.00 seconds immediately after every solve is completed (i.e., when the timer transitions into the "stopped" state), regardless of what the inspection countdown value was previously.
Ensure the inspection-warning state is also reset after each solve completion so the 8-second and 5-second inspection warnings can trigger normally on the next inspection.

new_feature_requests.summary: Reset inspection timer to 15 seconds after every solve event (even if inspection was stopped mid-countdown)

projectName: Reset inspection timer to 15 seconds after every solve
